text: Camila Cabello revealed this week that she spoke to friend Ariana Grande shortly after the tragedy at her Manchester concert – and confirmed that the singer was “ so shaken up. ” “ Yeah, I spoke to her after that happened, “ Cabello said on Britain ’ s This Morning Wednesday. “ I ’ m so sorry, I can ’ t even imagine. “ Cabello went on to say that she is “ so proud ” of Grande ’ s decision to return to Manchester to play a benefit show on June 4, adding, “ Ariana is one person who has always been so supportive of me. “ The benefit show is being held at the Emirates Old Trafford Cricket Ground and will feature the likes of Justin Bieber, Coldplay and Miley Cyrus, among others.
